author: Chris Kornelis
title: Yes, You Can Actually Have a Campfire in Your Backyard
text:
SUMMER IS THE PUREST celebration of heat. We’ve defeated winter again and pledged to spend our days under the blazing sun and—if we’re lucky—our nights enjoying a cold beer around a crackling fire.
Due to forest fire concerns, however, campfires now often get 86ed in summer. An alternative: creative new gadgets that can bring the benefits of fire to those who don’t have the time, space, skills, patience (or the Ranger’s approval) for a traditional burn.
...
